name: Temple University Ambler Campus
description: Community based testing site at Temple University's Ambler Campus in Upper Dublin Township

name: Penn Medicine - Radnor
description:
Penn Medicine has two ambulatory COVID-19 testing sites, one in West Philadelphia and one in Radnor, with test kits available for those who are experiencing coronavirus-like symptoms.

No co-pays or deductibles will be charged for testing, and uninsured patients will be able to be tested for free.

name: Chester County Hospital
description: Chester County Hospital is offering COVID-19 testing for community members who have valid orders from their medical providers.

name: Lancaster General Health Testing Site
description: Penn Medicine Lancaster General Health offers a drive-thru coronavirus (COVID-19) testing site conveniently located just outside of Lancaster City at the Pennsylvania College of Health Sciences.

name: Allegheny Health Network
description: At Allegheny Health Network (AHN), we put our patients first. You get the right care at the right time in your neighborhood and throughout western Pennsylvania

name: Abington Hospital Temporary Testing Site
description: The new site is for referral by a physician at Abington-Jefferson Health only, officials stress. Residents looking for a test are not permitted to show up otherwise.

name: Genesis Diagnostics
description: Schedule an appointment online. Approved by the Pennsylvania Department of Health, the test is for those who exhibit coronavirus symptoms and those who believe they have been exposed, said Miller. Such persons should contact a physician, who will order the test and contact the lab, Miller said.

name: Montgomery County Community College
description: Online registration opens at 8:00 AM each day that the test site is open. We strongly encourage you to ONLY register for a testing appointment on a day that you’re available to get tested. Our testing is performed on the same day that you register.

name: Rite Aid
description: To be tested here, you must be a healthcare worker or a first responder AND have symptoms consistent with COVID-19.

name: AFC Urgent Care Northern Liberties
description: Walk up testing. To be tested here, you must be screened via TeleCare in advance. Visit www.afcurgentcarenolibs.com OR www.afcurgentcarecheltenham.com and click “Book a Virtual Visit Online” to be seen by an AFC provider from your device in the comfort of your home.

name: AFC Urgent Care Cheltenham
